RegisterDescription.ToolTip: MATRIX VISION GenICam GenTL interface interface

Category.Name: Root
Category.ToolTip: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.
Category.Description: Provides the Root of the GenICam features tree.

Category.Name: Interface
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains items that belong to the interface module of the transport layer.
Category.Description: The Interface category contains items that belong to the interface module of the transport layer.

StringReg.Name: InterfaceID
StringReg.ToolTip: GenTL producer wide unique identifier of the selected interface.
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates a GenTL producer wide unique identifier of the selected interface.

IntReg.Name: InterfaceType_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Identifies the interfaces technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates interfaces technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_InterfaceType_Custom
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is a device for a custom protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is a device for a custom protocol.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_InterfaceType_GEV
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is an interface for the GigE Vision protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is an interface for the GigE Vision protocol.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_InterfaceType_U3V
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is an interface for the USB3 Vision protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is an interface for the USB3 Vision protocol.

Enumeration.Name: InterfaceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Identifies the interfaces technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates interfaces technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceGatewaySelector_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface.
IntReg.Description: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface. The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceGatewaySelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different gateway entries for this interface. The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceGateway_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the IP address of the selected gateway entry of this interface.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceMACAddress_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the 48-bit MAC address of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the 48-bit MAC address of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the 48-bit MAC address of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the 48-bit MAC address of this interface.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetSelector_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Selector for the different subnet entries for this interface.
IntReg.Description: Selector for the different subnet entries for this interface. The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different subnet entries for this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different subnet entries for this interface. The selector is 0-based in order to match the index of the C interface.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetIPAddress_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the IP address of the selected subnet entry of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the IP address of the selected subnet entry of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the IP address of the selected subnet entry of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the IP address of the selected subnet entry of this interface.

IntReg.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetMask_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the subnet mask of the selected subnet entry of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the subnet mask of the selected subnet entry of this interface.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the subnet mask of the selected subnet entry of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the subnet mask of the selected subnet entry of this interface.

IntReg.Name: mvGevInterfaceMTU_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the MTU of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the MTU(Maximum Transmission Unit) of this interface.

Integer.Name: mvGevInterfaceMTU
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the MTU of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the MTU(Maximum Transmission Unit) of this interface.

IntReg.Name: mvGevInterfaceLinkSpeed_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the link speed of this interface.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the link speed(in Mbits per second) of this interface.

Integer.Name: mvGevInterfaceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the link speed of this interface.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the link speed(in Mbits per second) of this interface.

IntReg.Name: mvGevAdvancedDeviceDiscoveryEnable_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Enables or disables the advanced device discovery.
IntReg.Description: Enables or disables the advanced device discovery. When enabled also devices, which currently use an incorrect IP configuration for the network they are connected to might be detectable. However depending on the operating system this may result in devices showing up on interfaces to which they are not physically connected.

Boolean.Name: mvGevAdvancedDeviceDiscoveryEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables or disables the advanced device discovery.
Boolean.Description: Enables or disables the advanced device discovery. When enabled also devices, which currently use an incorrect IP configuration for the network they are connected to might be detectable. However depending on the operating system this may result in devices showing up on interfaces to which they are not physically connected.
Boolean.DisplayName: mv Gev Advanced Device Discovery Enable

Command.Name: DeviceUpdateList
Command.ToolTip: Updates the internal device list of this interface.
Command.Description: This command updates the internal device list of this interface.

IntReg.Name: mvInterfaceAutoDeleteLostDevicesEnable_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Enables or disables automatic deletion of lost devices during a 'DeviceUpdateList' call.
IntReg.Description: Enables or disables automatic deletion of lost devices during a 'DeviceUpdateList' call. If a device is currently in use(has been opened and not been closed again), this feature can be used to switch of the automatic deletion of devices, which are no longer responding to discovery messages during a call to 'DeviceUpdateList'.

Boolean.Name: mvInterfaceAutoDeleteLostDevicesEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables or disables automatic deletion of lost devices during a 'DeviceUpdateList' call.
Boolean.Description: Enables or disables automatic deletion of lost devices during a 'DeviceUpdateList' call. If a device is currently in use(has been opened and not been closed again), this feature can be used to switch of the automatic deletion of devices, which are no longer responding to discovery messages during a call to 'DeviceUpdateList'.
Boolean.DisplayName: mv Interface Auto Delete Lost Devices Enable

IntReg.Name: mvActionDeviceKey_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: The device key for the action command
IntReg.Description: The device key is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

Integer.Name: mvActionDeviceKey
Integer.ToolTip: The device key for the action command
Integer.Description: The device key is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

IntReg.Name: mvActionGroupKey_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: The group key for the action command
IntReg.Description: The group key is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

Integer.Name: mvActionGroupKey
Integer.ToolTip: The group key for the action command
Integer.Description: The group key is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

IntReg.Name: mvActionGroupMask_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: The group mask for the action command
IntReg.Description: The group mask is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

Integer.Name: mvActionGroupMask
Integer.ToolTip: The group mask for the action command
Integer.Description: The group mask is one of the three main components that constitute an action command packet. It partly defines which device(s) will positively assert the action command packet.

IntReg.Name: mvActionScheduledTimeEnable_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Enables or disables action command scheduling
IntReg.Description: Action commands can be scheduled to execute at a particular moment in time, defined by the 'mvActionScheduledTime' property. If this is disabled the action command takes place immediately after it is received and asserted by each device.

Boolean.Name: mvActionScheduledTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables or disables action command scheduling
Boolean.Description: Action commands can be scheduled to execute at a particular moment in time, defined by the 'mvActionScheduledTime' property. If this is disabled the action command takes place immediately after it is received and asserted by each device.

IntReg.Name: mvActionScheduledTime_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Sets the time in which the action command will be executed
IntReg.Description: Sets the time in which the action command will be executed

Integer.Name: mvActionScheduledTime
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the time in which the action command will be executed
Integer.Description: Sets the time in which the action command will be executed

IntReg.Name: mvActionDestinationIPAddress_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: The IP address of the action command recepient
IntReg.Description: A valid IP address if the action command shall be unicast. A broadcast subnet if the action command shall be broadcast.

Integer.Name: mvActionDestinationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: The IP address of the action command recepient
Integer.Description: A valid IP address if the action command shall be unicast. A broadcast subnet if the action command shall be broadcast.

Command.Name: mvActionSend
Command.Description: It either sends an action command unicast packet to the IP address specified by the 'mvActionDestinationIPAddress' property, or sends an action command broadcast packet on the broadcast domain specified by the 'mvActionDestinationIPAddress' property

IntReg.Name: DeviceSelector_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Selector for the different devices on this interface.
IntReg.Description: Selector for the different devices on this interface. The limits of this feature might change upon execution of DeviceUpdateList.

Integer.Name: DeviceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selector for the different devices on this interface.
Integer.Description: Selector for the different devices on this interface. The limits of this feature might change upon execution of DeviceUpdateList.

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: Interface wide unique ID of the selected device.
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates a interface wide unique identifier of the selected device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device vendor.
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the name of the device vendor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device Model.
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the name of the device model.

IntReg.Name: DeviceType_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Identifies the device technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates device technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceType_Custom
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is a device for a custom protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is a device for a custom protocol.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceType_GEV
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is a device for the GigE Vision protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is a device for the GigE Vision protocol.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceType_U3V
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that this is a device for the USB3 Vision protocol.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that this is a device for the USB3 Vision protocol.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Identifies the device technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates device technology of the GenTL Producer implementation.

IntReg.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
IntReg.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link. Note that this represents the total speed of all the connections of the Link.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link. Note that this represents the total speed of all the connections of the Link.

IntReg.Name: DeviceAccessStatus_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the current access status for the device.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates the current access status for the device.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceAccessStatus_Unknown
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the device accessibility is not known.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the device accessibility is not known.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceAccessStatus_ReadWrite
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that full access to the device is available.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that full access to the device is available.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceAccessStatus_ReadOnly
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that read access to the device is available.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that read access to the device is available.

EnumEntry.Name: EnumEntry_DeviceAccessStatus_NoAccess
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that no access to the device is available.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that no access to the device is available.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceAccessStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the current access status for the device.
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a value that indicates the current access status for the device.

IntReg.Name: mvDeviceCommandChannelTransmissionTimeout_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Defines the maximum time in milli-seconds the host driver will wait for an ACK from the device to a previously sent command.
IntReg.Description: Defines the maximum time in milli-seconds the host driver will wait for an ACK from the device to a previously sent command.

Integer.Name: mvDeviceCommandChannelTransmissionTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the maximum time in milli-seconds the host driver will wait for an ACK from the device to a previously sent command.
Integer.Description: Defines the maximum time in milli-seconds the host driver will wait for an ACK from the device to a previously sent command.
Integer.DisplayName: mv Device Command Channel Transmission Timeout

IntReg.Name: mvDeviceCommandChannelRetryCount_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when command channel message timed out (no ACK was received from the device).
IntReg.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when command channel message timed out (no ACK was received from the device).

Integer.Name: mvDeviceCommandChannelRetryCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when command channel message timed out (no ACK was received from the device).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when command channel message timed out (no ACK was received from the device).
Integer.DisplayName: mv Device Command Channel Retry Count

IntReg.Name: GevVersionMajor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: GevVersionMinor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the GigE Vision specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: GenCPVersionMajor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: GenCPVersionMinor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the GenCP specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: U3vVersionMajor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: U3vVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the major version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: U3vVersionMinor_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.

Integer.Name: U3vVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the minor version number of the USB3 Vision specification this device complies with.

IntReg.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverSupported_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Reports the availability of the primary application switchover feature.
IntReg.Description: Reports the availability of the primary application switchover feature.

Boolean.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Reports the availability of the primary application switchover feature.
Boolean.Description: Reports the availability of the primary application switchover feature.
Boolean.DisplayName: mv Device Primary Application Switchover Supported

IntReg.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverEnable_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Enables or disables primary application switchover.
IntReg.Description: Enables or disables primary application switchover.

Boolean.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables or disables primary application switchover.
Boolean.Description: Enables or disables primary application switchover.
Boolean.DisplayName: mv Device Primary Application Switchover Enable

IntReg.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
IntReg.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests. If the device to take over has 'mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverEnable' set to true and this key matches the devices internal key control access will be granted.

Integer.Name: mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverKey
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests.
Integer.Description: Controls the key to use to authenticate primary application switchover requests. If the device to take over has 'mvDevicePrimaryApplicationSwitchoverEnable' set to true and this key matches the devices internal key control access will be granted.
Integer.DisplayName: mv Device Primary Application Switchover Key

IntReg.Name: mvDeviceNetworkInterfaceCount_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: The number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
IntReg.Description: This is an integer feature. It contains the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: mvDeviceNetworkInterfaceCount
Integer.ToolTip: The number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: This is an integer feature. It contains the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

IntReg.Name: GevDeviceIPAddress_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current IP address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

IntReg.Name: GevDeviceSubnetMask_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current subnet mask of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

IntReg.Name: GevDeviceMACAddress_CtrlValue
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Integer.Name: GevDeviceMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the 48-bit MAC address of the GVCP interface of the selected remote device.

Port.Name: InterfacePort
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the interface module of the transport layer.
Port.Description: Port giving access to the interface module of the transport layer.
